name: goapp
description: This project assumes you have go and npm installed

scripts.install: npm run clean-install && npm run install-negroni && npm run install-render && npm run install-logger && npm run install-static
scripts.do: npm run build && npm run run
scripts.files: cp assets/favicon.ico public && cp assets/robots.txt public && cp assets/noext public && cp -r assets/images public
scripts.prestart: npm run js && npm run sass && npm run files
